name: API Integration Examples
content:
ðŸ”Œ API Integration Examples

Last updated: March 2024

1. Authentication

---------------

```javascript

// Get access token

const response = await fetch('https://api.synergyos.com/auth/token', {

method: 'POST',

headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },

body: JSON.stringify({

client_id: 'YOUR_CLIENT_ID',

client_secret: 'YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET',

grant_type: 'client_credentials'

})

});

const { access_token } = await response.json();

```

2. User Management

----------------

```python

import requests

# Create user

response = requests.post(

'https://api.synergyos.com/v1/users',

headers={'Authorization': f'Bearer {access_token}'},

json={

'email': 'user@example.com',

'name': 'John Doe',

'role': 'user'

}

)

# Get user details

user_id = response.json()['id']

user = requests.get(

f'https://api.synergyos.com/v1/users/{user_id}',

headers={'Authorization': f'Bearer {access_token}'}

)

```

3. File Operations

---------------

```curl

# Upload file

curl -X POST https://api.synergyos.com/v1/files \

-H \"Authorization: Bearer $ACCESS_TOKEN\" \

-F \"file=@document.pdf\" \

-F \"metadata={\\\"type\\\":\\\"document\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[\\\"contract\\\"]}\"

# Download file

curl -X GET https://api.synergyos.com/v1/files/$FILE_ID \

-H \"Authorization: Bearer $ACCESS_TOKEN\" \

--output downloaded.pdf

```

4. Webhook Integration

-------------------

```typescript

// Register webhook

const webhook = await api.post('/webhooks', {

url: 'https://your-domain.com/webhook',

events: ['user.created', 'user.updated'],

secret: 'your-signing-secret'

});

// Verify webhook signature

import crypto from 'crypto';

function verifyWebhook(payload: string, signature: string) {

const hmac = crypto.createHmac('sha256', process.env.WEBHOOK_SECRET);

const digest = hmac.update(payload).digest('hex');

return crypto.timingSafeEqual(

Buffer.from(signature),

Buffer.from(digest)

);

}

```

5. Batch Operations

-----------------

```javascript

// Batch user update

const users = [

{ id: 'user_1', role: 'admin' },

{ id: 'user_2', role: 'editor' }

];

const batchResponse = await api.post('/batch', {

operations: users.map(user => ({

method: 'PATCH',

path: `/users/${user.id}`,

body: { role: user.role }

}))

});

```

6. Error Handling

---------------

```typescript

try {

const response = await api.get('/users/123');

} catch (error) {

if (error.response) {

switch (error.response.status) {

case 401:

// Handle unauthorized

await refreshToken();

break;

case 429:

// Handle rate limit

const retryAfter = error.response.headers['retry-after'];

await delay(retryAfter * 1000);

break;

default:

console.error('API Error:', error.response.data);

}

}

}

```

ðŸ“š Resources:

- API Docs: https://api.synergyos.com/docs

- SDK Reference: https://github.com/synergyos/sdk

- Support: api-support@synergyos.com
